Package coreClasses

Class Island

java.lang.Object
coreClasses.Island
public class Island
extends java.lang.Object
Represents an Island object
Since:
2/4/2021
Version:
17/5/2021
Author:
Jordan Vegar

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String fullInfo​(java.util.ArrayList<Route> routes)

  • Constructor Details

    • Island

      public Island​(java.lang.String name, Store store, java.lang.String description)
      Constructor method for an Island object
      Parameters:
      name - String for the name of the Island
      store - Store object on the Island
      description - String brief description of the island, gives an indication of what it's store will buy and sell.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string giving the name and description of an island.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • getIslandStore

      public Store getIslandStore()
      Getter method for the store belonging to island object
      Returns:
      Store belonging to Island Object

    • getIslandName

      public java.lang.String getIslandName()
      Getter method for the name of an island object
      Returns:
      String representation of an Island object

    • getDescription

      public java.lang.String getDescription()
      Getter method for the description of an island object. Also includes information on what the specialty of the Island Store is
      Returns:
      String representation for the description of an Island object

    • possibleRoutes

      public java.util.ArrayList<Route> possibleRoutes​(Island destination)
      Searches through the current island's routes to find those that go to the island the player wishes to travel to.
      Parameters:
      destination - Island object that you want to see routes to (from the player's current island)
      Returns:
      ArrayList of the routes from the current island to the destination island.

    • viewRoutes

      public java.lang.String viewRoutes​(java.util.ArrayList<Route> routes)
      Method for the getting a string representation of routes from an island
      Parameters:
      routes - ArrayList containing all the routes from a particular island. (from the player's current island)
      Returns:
      String representation of all the routes from a given island

    • fullInfo

      public java.lang.String fullInfo​(java.util.ArrayList<Route> routes)
      Creates a detailed description of this island, including info about the routes to it (from current island) and a list of items the store buys and sells.
      Parameters:
      routes - ArrayList of routes from the player's current island to this island.
      Returns:
      fullInfo String giving a detailed description of this island.

    • setRouteArray

      public void setRouteArray​(Route[] routes)
      Route objects require Island objects to be created, so an islands routes are created after the island is created. For this reason the routeArray cannot be included in the constructor. This method initializes the variable routeArray.
      Parameters:
      routes - Route[] array of routes that routeArray is to be assigned to.

    • shortestPossibleRoute

      public Route shortestPossibleRoute​(Island[] otherIslands)
      Searches through every route from this Island to any other Island to find the one with lowest distance. Allows calculating if the player has enough money to continue playing
      Parameters:
      otherIslands - Island[] array of all islands in the game except the player's current island.
      Returns:
      Route with the lowest distance from currentIsland.
